Title: Named Selection Source dropdown is enabled after both RST files load
Preconditions: Application launched; Analysis 1 and Analysis 2 RST files available
Steps: Load Analysis 1 RST > Load Analysis 2 RST > Observe Named Selection Source control
Expected: Named Selection Source dropdown is enabled

Title: Common mode lists only shared named selections
Preconditions: Both RST files loaded; Each file has named selections
Steps: Set Named Selection Source to Common (A1 & A2) > Open Named Selection dropdown
Expected: Only names existing in both analyses are listed

Title: Analysis 1 mode lists base-only names
Steps: Set Named Selection Source to Analysis 1 (Base) > Open Named Selection dropdown

Title: Analysis 2 mode lists combine-only names
Steps: Set Named Selection Source to Analysis 2 (Combine) > Open Named Selection dropdown

Title: Refresh respects current source mode
Preconditions: Both RST files loaded; Source mode selected
Expected: Named Selection list refreshes according to active source mode

Title: Same-name selection uses Analysis 1 node content for scoping
Preconditions: Both RST files loaded; At least one same-name NS with different node sets exists
Expected: Scoping follows Analysis 1 node set (base precedence)

Title: Analysis-2-only selection can be used for solve
Preconditions: Analysis 2 contains a unique NS not in Analysis 1
Steps: Set source mode to Analysis 2 > Select Analysis-2-only NS > Run solve

Title: Named selection field width supports long names
Preconditions: Both RST files loaded with long NS names
Steps: Open named selection dropdown and inspect selected field text
Expected: Long names are readable with reduced truncation in field and popup

Title: Base Analysis button tooltip explains reference role
Steps: Hover Select Base Analysis RST button
Expected: Tooltip explains base/reference role with steady-state example wording

Title: Analysis 2 button tooltip includes maneuver example
Steps: Hover Select Analysis to Combine RST button
Expected: Tooltip includes maneuver analysis example wording

Title: Named Selection Source tooltip explains three modes
Named Selection tooltip explains base precedence
Expected: Tooltip states same-name selections use Analysis 1 node content

Title: Import CSV tooltip documents expected headers and prefixes
Steps: Hover Import CSV button in combination table
Expected: HTML tooltip shows Combination Name and Type and accepted coefficient prefixes

Title: Output Options group tooltip explains exclusivity rules
Expected: Tooltip explains mutual exclusivity and combination-history behavior

Title: Display Load Visualization tooltip documents required CSV format
Expected: Tooltip explains required X Y Z columns optional NodeID and example header

Title: Add Row and Delete Row buttons show action tooltips
Steps: Hover Add Row > Hover Delete Row
Expected: Tooltips describe row addition and selected-row deletion

Title: View menu can globally disable tooltips
Steps: Open View menu > Uncheck Enable Tooltips > Hover any control
Expected: No tooltip popups appear while disabled

Title: Tooltip enable state persists across restart
Steps: Close app > Reopen app > Check View menu and hover behavior
Expected: Enable Tooltips state and behavior are restored from previous session

Title: Tooltip visual style matches sibling MARS_ palette
Steps: Hover any tooltip and inspect style
Expected: Tooltip style matches expected background text border and font settings from MARS_
